author: Elizabeth Gray
text: I am wondering if others have removed their old merry go rounds for safety reasons. If so, what were those reasons? we have already removed our metal slides because they get dangerously hot in the summer.  We would prefer to keep the merry go rounds, but I don't want to put my city at undue risk.
title: Old slides and merry go rounds
